<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 2: Calculate the Result](/Rules.aspx?ID=316)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 445 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
This step is simple. Add up all the various modifiers, bonuses, and penalties you identified in Step 1—this is your total modifier. Next add that to the number that came up on your d20 roll. This total is your check result.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
